attributes.action: set a price cap on energy company profits
attributes.additional_details: consumers are facing exorbitant price rises while at the same time the profits made by energy companies are going through the roof
attributes.background: limit the amount of profit energy companies can make from domestic supply of gas an electricity

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government is not responsible for how much profit private companies make, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Tax 50% of the Energy Companies profits to help households pay bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607983
